entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 8.
